oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tennessee Union Ticket, Election, August 1, 1861
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tennessee Union Ticket, Election, August 1, 1861 “Against the Permanent Constitution” (4 tickets uncut on one sheet, 4 x 7.5 inches). W.H. Polk - Governor; H. Maynard - Congress; J.W. Wester - Senator; R.H. Hodsden - Floater; Jno. M. Fleming - Representative. Ephemera 2016.003.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Political elections; Political parties; Ballots;
